original_text: Simon saw that God gave the Holy Spirit to people when the apostles put their hands on them. So he said to Peter and John, ‘Here is some money for you.
korean_text: 시몬이 사도들의 안수로 성령 받는 것을 보고 돈을 드려

sentences.original_text: that God gave the Holy Spirit to people
when the apostles put their hands on them
So he said to Peter and John
Here is some money for you
